about_me: I’m a maker. I’m constantly tinkering and creating things - from apps to model rockets. I’m motivated by challenging work and excited about solving real problems.

I'm one of the co-founders of Pillsy, a digital health startup in Seattle, WA. I used to work at Microsoft on the Groove Music app. Before that, I studied Computer Science at the University of Michigan in Ann Arbor, MI.
I love to travel and meet new people. In my free time I enjoy being outdoors, especially in the mountains or on the water.
aspiration: To build technologies that help make people happier and healthier.
